title: How to Draw Snorlax

steps.headline: Make Snorlax's head.
steps.description: Draw a lemon shaped head and two triangles to resemble the head and ears.

steps.headline: Make Snorlax's arms.
steps.description: Connect two banana shaped arms on each side of the head.

steps.headline: Make the belly.
steps.description: Snorlax is known for having a gigantic stomach. Draw a large curve for the belly.

steps.headline: Make the feet.
steps.description: Draw to circles at the bottom for feet.

steps.headline: Add facial features.
steps.description: Draw two lines for sleepy eyes and one for the smiley mouth. Draw tiny triangles on the end of the arms for claws.

steps.headline: Draw another circle on each foot for paws and add three triangles on each foot.
Finish your drawing by adding colour.
Draw the body and head.
steps.description: Create Snorlax's head and body by drawing 2 oval shapes onto paper.

steps.headline: Outline his face.
steps.description: Draw an m shape on the head to make the face.

steps.headline: Draw Snorlax's ears.
steps.description: Create the ears by drawing 2 triangle shapes on top of the head.

steps.headline: Outline the stomach by drawing a curved u shape.
Create the feet.
steps.description: Draw two ovals shapes for each foot.

steps.headline: Create the arms
steps.description: Draw 2 curved u shapes for the arms.

steps.headline: Draw guidelines onto the face.
steps.description: Draw guidelines to help you put the eyes and nose in the right spot.

steps.headline: Create the mouth and eyes.
steps.description: Draw 3 curved lines 1 for the mouth and 2 for the eyes.

steps.headline: Outline the feet.
steps.description: Draw 2 ovals in both feet to outline.

steps.headline: Create the nails.
steps.description: Draw 3 curved nails on each foot.

steps.headline: Erase the guidelines.
steps.description: Remove all guidelines carefully with a good quality eraser.

steps.headline: Colour in Snorlax to complete the drawing.

text: Original Snorlax Make Snorlax's head. Draw a lemon shaped head and two triangles to resemble the head and ears. Make Snorlax's arms. Connect two banana shaped arms on each side of the head. Make the belly. Snorlax is known for having a gigantic stomach. Draw a large curve for the belly. Make the feet. Draw to circles at the bottom for feet. Add facial features. Draw two lines for sleepy eyes and one for the smiley mouth. Draw tiny triangles on the end of the arms for claws. Draw another circle on each foot for paws and add three triangles on each foot.  Erase the guide lines.  Finish your drawing by adding colour.  Chibi Snorlax Draw the body and head. Create Snorlax's head and body by drawing 2 oval shapes onto paper. Outline his face. Draw an m shape on the head to make the face. Draw Snorlax's ears. Create the ears by drawing 2 triangle shapes on top of the head. Outline the stomach by drawing a curved u shape.  Create the feet. Draw two ovals shapes for each foot. Create the arms Draw 2 curved u shapes for the arms. Draw guidelines onto the face. Draw guidelines to help you put the eyes and nose in the right spot. Create the mouth and eyes. Draw 3 curved lines 1 for the mouth and 2 for the eyes. Outline the feet. Draw 2 ovals in both feet to outline. Create the nails. Draw 3 curved nails on each foot. Erase the guidelines. Remove all guidelines carefully with a good quality eraser. Colour in Snorlax to complete the drawing.

Colour in Snorlax to complete the drawing.
